author: J. L.Shillingburg

review: Great little device and worked when it did.  I tried two of these units and although they are easy to set up and the principal is simple, my remote pause function simply did not work 100% of the time.  When it did not work, it took me back to the beginning of selecting the movie I was watching and then trying to find where I left off.  Totally unacceptable.  I have a great TV, the batteries we NOT the issue and I know how to drive a remote.  Two strikes and you're out ROKU.  I ordered an Amazon Fire stick to replace it.
author: Milford Duane Hickory Montgomery "gotfish"

review: I've had ROKU since the first box.  Haven't had cable for years.  The stick takes up way less room and one less cable.  It gets pretty hot when streaming, unlike the boxes.  It stays warm when not in use.  I disconnect the power supply when not in use.  With thousands of channels available, there's always something to watch.
